metadata.synopsis: Two jetliners collide, and Bill Smith (Kris Kristofferson) is put in charge of investigating the accident. But something isn't adding up about the crash -- from the strange comments on the flight recorder to the unidentifiable object found in the wreckage. What Smith doesn't know is that time travelers have taken the ill-fated passengers to repopulate the future. To ensure their mission's success, they send a gorgeous operative, Louise (Cheryl Ladd), to the past to hamper Smith's work.

reviews: Millennium plays out much like someone trying to drunkenly explain the plot of a Doctor Who episode they haven't seen in several years.
Watchable, very weird sci-fi; book is better
